hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'd like to apply for this job roidsmall.net reveiws I second that, billpr. I always liked and admired Jack Germond. I used to read his op-eds and watch him on the McLaughlin Group. He was my favorite talking head on that show. To be honest, I’m surprised he made it to 85, given his weight. (I’m surprised anyone makes it to 85 :O) He was an excellent journalist, the kind we don’t see enough of these days. God speed, Jack Germond, and thank you for your contribution to man’s struggling intelligence.
